metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8650 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
python-requests-Kerberos through 0.5 does not handle mutual authentication

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8650` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-requests-kerberos - 0.5-2
python3-requests-kerberos - 0.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-requests-kerberos package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.5-2').
